title: IVertex.IGetClosestPointOn
description: Gets the closest point on the vertex using the X, Y, Z input point.
signature:
System.Double IGetClosestPointOn( 
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.Double
Z
)

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X value of the input point

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y value of the input point

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: Z value of the input point

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of five doubles representing the X, Y, Z point on the vertex VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
